arts.ttl: Colchester United v Cheltenham Town RECAP: Jordan Thomas double seals first away win
arts.sum: Cheltenham dug in during the second half to protect their lead, with Joe Day forced to make one serious save with his legs to deny Taylor a second in the 88th minute. Jordan Thomas' first-half double secured Cheltenham Town's first away win of the League Two campaign at Colchester United.

arts.ttl: Jordan Thomas stars as Cheltenham beat Colchester
arts.sum: Thoams netted either side of Lyle Taylor’s equaliser.

arts.ttl: Cheltenham Town chairman David Bloxham on summer of change, current finances, search for new investment, the FED role and expectations for season
arts.sum: There are loads of things we’d like to do at this football club and I don’t need to name them because I am sure fans know what they are. It’s a shining star in our club and if we had some of that money to improve facilities at Seasons, we could attract better prospects still and nurture the prospects we’ve got.
